title: 👋HI STUDENTS🎈Come Tour Remodeled 🎀STUDIO close to college🎈Parking
posting_body: 4901 Clair Del Ave., Long Beach, CA, 90807
CLAIR DEL GARDENS IN LONG BEACH, CA
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 450 Sq.
Welcome to Clair Del Gardens located in beautiful Long Beach, California.
Clair Del Gardens is set in an area known for its famous landmarks and peaceful atmosphere.
Clair Del Gardens is the perfect apartment community for any lifestyle.
Long beach is a thriving beach city, home to the historic Queen Mary, Los Cerritos Ranch, El Dorado Park and Long Beach Aquarium.
Clair Del Gardens is characterized by park-like gardens and grassy knolls.
The distinctive residences of Clair Del Gardens present a compelling portrait of gracious living while reflecting a passion for simplicity and comfort.
Our well designed one- and two-bedroom floor plans feature high ceilings, spacious closets, and private decks.
We offer an irresistible combination of residential affordability, convenience, and unrivaled quality that you can't find anywhere else.
You define your style, we'll provide the best of everything.
Pets - small allowed, Max weight 20 lb each, Pet Rent $50.00, Pet Deposit $300.00
Total Income, combined together, needs to meet 2.5 times the rent amount
Major Cross streets: Cherry & Del Amo Blvd.
